name: Fresh Deck Poker - Live Holdem
description:
Holdem Poker like you've never seen it before! Fresh Deck Poker is the hottest free casino style Texas Hold'em poker game with awesome sit-n-go poker tournaments and sweet casino mini-games. Our ultra realistic texas poker experience will make you feel like you are sitting in a Las Vegas casino instead of at your buddies’ poker night at home. There’s nothing like Fresh Deck’s casino poker feel.

Continuous Poker Texas Holdem Anywhere
The ONLY cross platform Texas Hold'em game, play poker online on your Android phone and continue your SAME GAME on your Android Tablet or on Facebook from your computer! No other free poker games are this versatile!

Real World Poker Style in a Free Poker Game App
Fresh Deck is the ONLY online poker app to have its random number generator certified by GLI, the company that certifies all real money gaming machines like Vegas slot machines and state lottery machines. Play with 100% confidence that at Fresh Deck Poker, all our poker hands are a fair deal. Check out our certification here: http://goo.gl/G1VZtr

Create Your Poker Star Avatar
• Avatar Creator: create your own avatar from one our many gorgeous options
• Play poker online under an alias you design on your own and show your best poker face
• Level Up to unlock: challenges, poker tables, and VIP poker avatars as you become a poker king

Ante Up and Become a Vegas Casino Poker Pro
• Turbo speed No Limit Poker with Texas Hold'em Sit-and-Go’s that feel like live poker
• Royal Hold'em: the only app featuring a 20 Card deck so you can get that Royal Flush with a faster deal
• Re-buy Sit-and-Go Tournaments
• 5 and 9 handed Ring Game tables
• Reel Poker: Mini-Game gives you FREE POKER CHIPS daily
Raise the Stakes and Play with Friends
• Buddy Lists: Track the Fish and avoid the Sharks so you can win big pots just like vegas poker on the world poker tour
• Leaderboards: See how you stack up against other online poker players

Install today and see if you can river the ace on a royal flush with Fresh Deck Poker.

Like us on Facebook: http://goo.gl/qKqXt7
Follow us @ Twitter: http://goo.gl/nTN6NN
Circle us on G+: http://goo.gl/VR9tNY

Playing this game does not guarantee that you will improve your skills or ability to win in a casino.
